attributes.action: Request that all people from any country wanting to live in Great Britain speak english to a reasonable level to allow their integration into the wider community and only have forms written in English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would allow only those wishing to live and integrate with us to be allowed to stay, having enclaves of people from other countries not wanting any of our values, not able to speak english, demanding free speech, whilst hating the free speech of others, purporting to be religious when hating all other religions, dispising our culture, is a recipe for disaster

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
